channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 从一项指标来看，日本股市已成为两年来对日元走势最敏感的股市，这增加了创纪录的股市涨势停滞不前的风险
item.description:
Japanese stocks have become the most sensitive to yen moves in two years by one measure, increasing risks of the record equity rally stalling https://t.co/oCjdX2wfbY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 华为去年依靠美国技术实现了先进芯片的突破，这表明中国仍需要一些外国元件
item.description:
Huawei relied on US technology to make an advanced chip breakthrough last year, suggesting China still needs some foreign components https://t.co/ZrXnfRdO4V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英国立法者警告说，应禁止银行和金融公司在职场性骚扰纠纷中使用保密协议
item.description:
Banks and financial firms should be banned from using NDAs in workplace sexual harassment disputes, British lawmakers have warned https://t.co/ydlCqmL0Vz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国检察官将继续寻求引渡前加密货币大亨 Do Kwon，使其因价值 400 亿美元的 TerraUSD 稳定币崩盘而受到指控。
item.description:
US prosecutors will continue to seek extradition of former crypto mogul Do Kwon to face charges over the $40 billion collapse of the TerraUSD stablecoin https://t.co/Qn4TrFOpOp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁军队将海洋战略与经济发展相协调

Chinese President Xi Jinping called on the military to coordinate its maritime strategy with economic development https://t.co/UK2sFUPTxB

item.title: 日本仍然是唯一一个强迫已婚夫妇共用一个姓氏的国家。这六对夫妇正试图改变这一沿袭百年的制度。#IWD2024
item.description:
Japan remains the only country that forces married couples to share a surname. These six couples are trying to change the century-old system. #IWD2024https://t.co/sWlMQc4JRQ

— Momoka Yokoyama | 横山桃花 (@MomokaYokoyama_) March 8, 2024

item.title: #5Things：美联储和欧洲央行正慢慢向降息靠拢。日本央行加息的赌注越来越大。中国正在审查银行的债券投资。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
#5Things: The Fed and ECB are slowly edging toward cutting rates. Bets are mounting on BOJ hikes. China is scrutinizing bond investments by banks. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/w6nEVkbrqr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据新提交的文件，加拿大最大的三家银行的高层管理人员去年的收入低于他们的目标薪酬
item.description:
The top executives at three of Canada’s biggest banks took home less than their target pay last year, according to new filings https://t.co/IEIL37Xb7j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 随着埃及从国际货币基金组织（IMF）和双边贷款机构获得新的资金，穆迪将埃及的信用展望上调至正面
item.description:
Egypt’s credit outlook was raised to positive by Moody’s as the nation unlocks fresh funding from the IMF and bilateral lenders https://t.co/HGnyi7m9Tg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃有意连任国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁五年，并有望获得足够的支持
item.description:
Kristalina Georgieva is interested in a second five-year term as head of the IMF and is poised to secure sufficient support https://t.co/BHKBv1ITQ1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: TC 能源公司向美国中西部和墨西哥湾沿岸输送重质加拿大原油的 Keystone 石油管道周四部分关闭，导致石油期货在结算后交易中走高。
item.description:
TC Energy's Keystone oil pipeline, which transports heavy Canadian crude to the US Midwest and Gulf Coast, partially shut Thursday, sending oil futures higher in post-settlement trading. https://t.co/Tpg1K88Amx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 斯坦福大学学生运营的基金对比特币 ETF 的投资表明，下一代机构投资者中可能会有更多加密货币的忠实信徒
item.description:
A Stanford student-run fund's Bitcoin ETF investment shows that the next generation of institutional investors may include more true believers in crypto https://t.co/3ryGshplUn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国副总理罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）表示，必须对从俄罗斯逃避制裁中获利的国家采取更强硬的立场
item.description:
German Vice Chancellor Robert Habeck says a tougher stance must be taken against countries that are profiting from Russia’s sanction evasion https://t.co/rsqXpiipCT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 随着波音公司最近在 737 Max 上的失误，空中客车公司有机会巩固其主导地位，并使这场竞争的天平更持久地向其倾斜。
item.description:
With Boeing on the ropes following its most recent mishap with the 737 Max, Airbus has an opportunity to cement its dominance and tilt the balance of this rivalry more permanently in its favor https://t.co/bAyoK6p42C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Gap 公布第四季度盈利超出预期，随后股价上涨，这表明这家历史悠久的服装零售商扭亏为盈的努力正在结出硕果。
item.description:
Gap rose after reporting fourth-quarter earnings that exceeded expectations, a sign that efforts to turn the storied apparel retailer around are bearing fruit. https://t.co/btuq2yXXyA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在 S&P Global 出现罕见失误后，包括摩根士丹利和 PNC 在内的一些美国最大银行的股价最近几天出现了不同寻常的走势
item.description:
Shares of some of the biggest US banks, including Morgan Stanley and PNC, went on an unusual ride in recent days after a rare S&P Global blunder https://t.co/VtWzZnH0Dg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 无国界医生组织说，巴拿马迫使该组织暂停为穿越达连湾的移民提供医疗服务
item.description:
Doctors Without Borders said Panama forced it to suspend medical operations to migrants crossing the Darien Gap https://t.co/9NcMXdU9sf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）表示，1 月份纽约私营部门的就业人数跃升至创纪录的 835 万，标志着纽约州已从冠状病毒大流行中完全恢复。
item.description:
New York’s private-sector workforce jumped to a record of 8.35 million jobs in January, marking the state’s full recovery from the coronavirus pandemic, Governor Kathy Hochul said. https://t.co/XI05RObpk9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔告诉参议员们，美联储距离有足够信心降息 "不远"。克里斯蒂娜-拉加德表示欧洲央行可能在 6 月放宽政策
item.description:
Jerome Powell told senators the Fed is “not far” from being confident enough to cut rates. Christine Lagarde indicated the ECB may ease in June https://t.co/LhrRMgzE0H

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登今晚的国情咨文演讲可能是他五十年政治生涯中最重要的演讲
item.description:
Joe Biden’s State of the Union address tonight may be the most important of his five-decade political career https://t.co/1h77QLezSk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 货币市场基金资产连续第二周升至历史新高，原因是在交易商收敛了对美联储今年首次降息的押注后，预期短期利率将在更长时间内保持高位。
item.description:
Money-market fund assets rose to a fresh record high for the second straight week on expectations short-term rates will remain elevated for longer after traders reined in bets on the first Federal Reserve cuts this year. https://t.co/8wRKKfyaoN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 白宫一位高级能源顾问表示，是否需要新设施向国外出口液化天然气是一个未决问题
item.description:
A senior White House energy adviser said the need for new facilities to export liquefied natural gas abroad is an open question https://t.co/JZlEvrFcJn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美联储的一项最新调查显示，尽管债务负担加重和高借贷利率限制了小型企业获得新的信贷，但美国小型企业对2024年的前景依然乐观。
item.description:
Small businesses in the US remained upbeat in their outlook for 2024 despite elevated debt burdens and high borrowing rates that limited their access to new credit, a new Federal Reserve survey showed. https://t.co/rDEhZ49RE8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Memecoins 是一种加密货币，源于网络流行语或笑话。其中一些正屡创新高。了解更多
item.description:
Memecoins are a type of cryptocurrency that originated from internet memes or jokes. Some of them are at record highs. Here's what to know https://t.co/2mXPLIBTaU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会（SEC）延长了批准直接投资于比特币的 ETF 期权交易的时间期限。
item.description:
The SEC has extended the timeline for which it will make decision on approving the trading of options on ETFs that invest directly in Bitcoin https://t.co/nIOjuWLewO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国 1 月份消费者借贷超出预期，因为非循环信贷攀升至 7 个月来的最高点。
item.description:
US consumer borrowing in January exceeded forecast as non-revolving credit climbed the most in seven months. https://t.co/wqBxtdwO4T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024
